name: Pro Strategy Football 2018
description: This realistic simulation of American football is for fans who love coaching, managing, or even simulating games, weeks, or entire seasons. Coach, Manage, or both! Watch simulated games live! Edit and share unlimited number of leagues!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 and above Processor: Intel Pentium 3, Intel Core, AMD Athlon 1 GHz+ Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: minimum resolution: 1024x768 Storage: 200 MB available space
